description:
Princess Kakyu, the missing princess whom the Star Lights have long been searching for, finally appears before the Sailor Guardians. Princess Kakyu explains that she has come to Earth in search of the Light of Hope...
Source: hulu

titles.title: Crusade for the Galaxy: Legend of the Sailor Wars
Ginga no Seisen Sailor Wars Densetsu
Las Guerreros sagradas de la vía lactea. La leyenda de la batalla de las Guerreros.
銀河の聖戦セーラーウォーズ伝説
